TextView.android:text: The Department has well experienced faculty members and well established laboratories. The major laboratories of the Dept Strength og materials lab, Concrete material testing lab, Fluid mechanics lab, Geo-techinical engineering lab, Transporation engg lab, Surveying lab, Enivironmental engg lab. The computation lab has STAAD PRO, AUTO CAD.
Computer Applications in Civil Engineering Laboratory
Computer Aided Analysis and Design in Civil Engineering
